Description: On US-522 North in the County of Louisa, in the vicinity of the ramp from and to I-64W, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. Lane closures exist.

Description: On I-195 at mile marker 1.6 in the City of Richmond, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right lane and right shoulder are closed.
